# JOB EXPECTATIONS ## Chemist
The Chemist is responsible for creating and maintaining medicines and other chemicals. Their immediate duties are to provide medicines for the Medical staff, but they can create other chemicals as needed.
## Do - Prioritize creating medicines for the Medical staff before working on other chemicals. - Provide other chemicals as needed for justified reasons.
## Don't - Disregard medicine production to make other chemicals first. - Mix potassium with water.
